title: Review Mobile Device Management (MDM) Policy
description: An IT auditor reviews the controls over mobile devices that connect to the corporate network.

tasks.description: Review the MDM policy to ensure it requires all mobile devices to have a passcode and be encrypted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the policy has the required security settings.

tasks.description: Obtain a report from the MDM system to verify that all enrolled devices are compliant with the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report shows 10 devices that are not encrypted.

tasks.description: Verify that the MDM system has the capability to remotely wipe a device if it is lost or stolen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the remote wipe functionality is enabled and tested.
